class schemas.ContactBase(*, first_name: str, last_name: str, email: EmailStr, phone: str, birthday: date, additional_info: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

Base schema for a contact, used for shared attributes across create, update, and read models.

additional_info: str | None
birthday: date
email: EmailStr
first_name: str
last_name: str
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

phone: str
